author: Xbox
description:
“A Masterclass of Gameplay and Design” – Impulse Gamer

Stand And Fight as the super weapon of gods and kings, shred enemies with devastating favorites like the Super Shotgun while also wielding a variety of new bone-chewing weapons, including the versatile Shield Saw. Players will stand and fight on the demon-infested battlefields in the vicious, grounded combat the original DOOM is famous for. Take flight atop the new fierce Mecha Dragon, stand tall in a massive Atlan mech, and beat demons to a pulp with the newly enhanced glory kill system. Only the Slayer has the power to wield these devastating tools of mayhem.

ESRB RATING: Mature for Blood and Gore and Intense Violence.

https://www.xbox.com/games/doom-the-dark-ages

author: Xbox
description:
Meet an eccentric artist with a disturbing past in Brushes with Death, the new story DLC for Kingdom Come: Deliverance II.

Embark on a series of brand-new quests as you help the Painter finish his artistic magnum opus. In return for your deadly endeavors, you'll be able to choose from over 100 unique shield designs and earn a new set of gear for Henry.

Brushes with Death DLC is out now

author: Xbox
description:
Are you ready to #ForgeYourLegend? 
 
A demo for Blades of Fire is available to download and play now! 
 
What's more, pick up the game at launch and your save data will carry over!
 
Blades of Fire launches May 22nd on Xbox!
